* `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<Flight flightOriginDate="###"...>` = Flight Leg Data Model `udor` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<FlightNumber airlineIATACode="#"...>` = Flight Leg Data Model `carrier` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<FlightNumber...number="#"...>` = Flight Leg Data Model `flightNumber` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<FlightNumber...operationalSuffix="#">` = Flight Leg Data Model `suffix` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<DepartureAirport><AirportIATACode>` = Flight Leg Data Model `departureAirport` * `ATCFlightPlan.xml.<ArrivalAirport><AirportIATACode>` = Flight Leg Data Model `arri
